about_the_game:
Dynamic Soundtrack:
Enjoy new music specially crafted for this DLC. With a variety of musical styles, you'll find exciting electronic beats and captivating melodies to accompany you through the most challenging levels.

New Musical Challenges:
The new music adds an extra layer of excitement to the game's challenges. Each track has been carefully designed to fit seamlessly with the gameplay, making every stage a unique and thrilling experience.

Immersive Atmosphere:
Immerse yourself in an engaging atmosphere while playing. The new music creates a more immersive experience, taking you on an exciting and adrenaline-filled journey.

Get ready for a refreshed gaming experience with the "New Music" DLC for "The Hardest Game in the Universe 2" and challenge yourself to overcome obstacles to the beat of a new rhythm!
